data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Harghita be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Harghita, Romania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Harghita, Romania, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Harghita, Romania.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 301,500 souls living in the state of Harghita with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Uzbek, Northern people.
Lord, help the people of Harghita, Romania to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, please defend the 19,084 believers in Harghita against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Harghita, Romania has a population of 301,500.

We estimate Harghita has 19,084 people who might know Jesus, 263,288 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,128 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Harghita that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.
